original_text: For they have gone in to her, as men go in to a prostitute. Thus they went in to Oholah and to Oholibah, lewd women!
korean_text: 그들이 그에게 나오기를 기생에게 나옴 같이 음란한 여인 오홀라와 오홀리바에게 나왔은즉

sentences.original_text: For they have gone in to her,
as men go in to a prostitute.
Thus they went in to Oholah and to Oholibah,
